trans-unit.target: Fornece um ponto de extremidade de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class uses classes derived from DiscoveryEndpointProvider to get the discovery endpoint to use.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>classe usa classes derivadas de DiscoveryEndpointProvider para obter o ponto de extremidade de descoberta usado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider"> </xref> classe.
Obtém o ponto de extremidade de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class calls the GetDiscoveryEndpoint method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instance passed by the user to get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> for discovering the services.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>classe chama o método GetDiscoveryEndpoint a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider>instância passada pelo usuário para obter o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint>para descobrir os serviços.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> also calls GetDiscoveryEndpoint method whenever it must clone itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>também chama o método GetDiscoveryEndpoint sempre que ele deve clone a mesmo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>
O ponto de extremidade de descoberta.
